Get a complete pair (frame + lenses) of eyeglasses starting at $59. Includes select CHAPS, A New Day™, Cat & Jack ™,and Goodfellow ™ & Co. frames for $59 or select Armani Exchange, Arnette and Vogue frames for $99, with single vision ComfortLight (plastic) lenses. Select lens upgrades available - $30 for ComfortLight IntelliBlue, $90 for ComfortLight Active lenses (polycarbonate with anti-reflective), and $70 for multi-focal lenses (lined multi-focal and progressives). No other frame or lens upgrades allowed. Complete pair (frame and lenses) purchase required. Valid prescription required. Cannot be combined with vision insurance benefits, other offers, or previous purchases. Offer is not eligible for 40% Off Additional Pairs promotion. Valid in-store and online; frame selection varies by store and select frame brands available online, pricing could vary. For online purchases apply promo code in cart to receive full savings. Void where prohibited by law. Discounts off tag price. No cash value. See Target Optical® Employee for details.
